item.title: Google Dorking
item.description: Google Dorking External services Service info GHDB Google Hacking Database EXACT-MATCH Force an exact-match search. Use this to refine results for ambiguous searches, or to exclude synonyms when searching for single words. "Dank memes" OR Search for X or Y. This will return results related to X or Y, or both. Note: The pipe (|) operator can also be used in place of “OR”.
